name: Provian® Potassium Neutralized Dry Vinegar
description: Provian NDV is the latest clean label development in the Provian® family and it is a unique, clean label, no-sodium meat preservative based naturally fermented vinegar. Since Provian NDV is produced from naturally fermented vinegar that is compliant to the relevant legislations, Provian NDV can be labeled as Dry Vinegar, Neutralized Vinegar or Buffered Vinegar. Provian NDV can be used in meat and poultry products labeled with a natural claim.
